Instruction: Cook the onions and green bell peppers in a large skillet with vegetable oil over medium heat until softened and slightly browned, for about 8 to 12 minutes. Stir in ketchup, sugar, chili powder, hot pepper sauce, and cinnamon until well combined. Add water, allow the mixture to come to a boil, and then simmer uncovered until the onions are tender, approximately 10 more minutes.
